meanings.definition: A mythical creature said to inhabit the Himalayan mountains.
meanings.sent1: The children told stories about the yeti living in the snowy mountains.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in the existence of the yeti in the Himalayas.
meanings.sent3: The yeti decided to take a vacation to the beach for a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was as elusive as a yeti in the misty mountains.
meanings.sent5: The yeti's roar echoed through the valleys, sending shivers down their spines.

meanings.definition: Up to the present time; until now.
meanings.sent1: I have not seen him yeti today.
meanings.sent2: She has yeti to finish her homework.
meanings.sent3: The cake is not ready yeti; we need to wait a bit longer.
meanings.sent4: The sun has yeti to rise over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The train has yeti arrived at the station, so we have some time to spare.

meanings.sent1: I wanted to go out; yeti, it started raining.
meanings.sent2: She was tired; yeti, she continued to work hard.
meanings.sent3: He forgot his umbrella; yeti, he stayed dry by hiding under a tree.
meanings.sent4: The road was long and difficult; yeti, they reached their destination before sunset.
meanings.sent5: The movie was not what I expected; yeti, I enjoyed it nonetheless.
